option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd"> <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
<groupId>com.roadster</groupId> <artifactId>roadster-demo</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> <packaging>jar</packaging>
<name>Roadster JavaFX Demo</name> <description>A JavaFX demo application for the Roadster project</description>
<properties> <maven.compiler.source>17</maven.compiler.source> <maven.compiler.target>17</maven.compiler.target> <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding> <javafx.version>17.0.2</javafx.version> </properties>
<dependencies> <!-- JavaFX Dependencies --> <dependency> <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId> <artifactId>javafx-controls</artifactId> <version>${javafx.version}</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId> <artifactId>javafx-fxml</artifactId> <version>${javafx.version}</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId> <artifactId>javafx-graphics</artifactId> <version>${javafx.version}</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId> <artifactId>javafx-base</artifactId> <version>${javafx.version}</version> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <!-- Maven Compiler Plugin --> <plugin> <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId> <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId> <version>3.11.0</version> <configuration> <source>17</source> <target>17</target> </configuration> </plugin>
<!-- JavaFX Maven Plugin --> <plugin> <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId> <artifactId>javafx-maven-plugin</artifactId> <version>0.0.8</version> <configuration> <mainClass>com.roadster.Main</mainClass> </configuration> </plugin>
<!-- Maven Shade Plugin for creating executable JAR --> <plugin> <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId> <artifactId>maven-shade-plugin</artifactId> <version>3.4.1</version> <executions> <execution> <phase>package</phase> <goals> <goal>shade</goal> </goals> <configuration> <transformers> <transformer implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ManifestResourceTransformer"> <mainClass>com.roadster.Main</mainClass> </transformer> </transformers> </configuration> </execution> </executions> </plugin> </plugins> </build> </project>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd"> <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
<groupId>com.roadster</groupId> <artifactId>roadster-demo</artifactId> <version>1.0.0</version> <packaging>jar</packaging>
<name>Roadster JavaFX Demo</name> <description>A JavaFX demo application for the Roadster project</description>
<properties> <maven.compiler.source>17</maven.compiler.source> <maven.compiler.target>17</maven.compiler.target> <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding> <javafx.version>17.0.6</javafx.version> </properties>
<dependencies> <!-- JavaFX Dependencies --> <dependency> <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId> <artifactId>javafx-controls</artifactId> <version>${javafx.version}</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId> <artifactId>javafx-fxml</artifactId> <version>${javafx.version}</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId> <artifactId>javafx-graphics</artifactId> <version>${javafx.version}</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId> <artifactId>javafx-base</artifactId> <version>${javafx.version}</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId> <artifactId>javafx-web</artifactId> <version>${javafx.version}</version> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <!-- Maven Compiler Plugin --> <plugin> <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId> <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId> <version>3.11.0</version> <configuration> <source>17</source> <target>17</target> </configuration> </plugin>
<!-- JavaFX Maven Plugin --> <plugin> <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId> <artifactId>javafx-maven-plugin</artifactId> <version>0.0.8</version> <configuration> <mainClass>com.roadster.Main</mainClass> </configuration> </plugin>
<!-- Maven Shade Plugin for creating executable JAR --> <plugin> <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId> <artifactId>maven-shade-plugin</artifactId> <version>3.4.1</version> <executions> <execution> <phase>package</phase> <goals> <goal>shade</goal> </goals> <configuration> <transformers> <transformer implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ManifestResourceTransformer"> <mainClass>com.roadster.Main</mainClass> </transformer> </transformers> </configuration> </execution> </executions> </plugin> </plugins> </build> </project>

option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Label?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane?> <?import javafx.scene.web.WebView?>
<BorderPane xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml" fx:controller="com.roadster.controllers.MapsController">
<!-- Header at the top --> <top> <VBox spacing="15.0" style="-fx-background-color: #ffffff; -fx-padding: 20; -fx-border-color: #e0e0e0; -fx-border-width: 0 0 1 0;"> <!-- Header with logo and back button --> <HBox spacing="20.0" alignment="CENTER_LEFT"> <Button fx:id="backButton" text="â† Back to Dashboard" onAction="#onBackToDashboard" style="-fx-background-color: #3498db; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-padding: 10 20; -fx-border-radius: 5; -fx-background-radius: 5;"/>
<Label text="Interactive Map" style="-fx-font-size: 24px; -fx-font-weight: bold; -fx-text-fill: #2c3e50;"/> </HBox> </VBox> </top>
<!-- Map WebView in the center --> <center> <WebView fx:id="mapWebView"/> </center>
</BorderPane>
